1.0.name: wordpress/wp-simple-insert
1.0.description:
WPSimpleInsert is a plugin to insert custom code in your blog posts. It includes options to either add the code above or below post content.

Features:

  • Add custom HTML/PHP/JavaScript to your posts.
  • Ability to add custom code above or below post content.
  • Options to hide the code from certain pages like the home page and category and archives pages.
